summary: A simple mod that unfurls the Dainty Sload\'s sails by using PROMETHEUS_ts\'s sail mesh.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i116.photobucket.com/albums/o22/98LS1TA/promshipadrt.png[/IMG]

==================
[color=#00ff7f]Description:[/color]
==================

A simple mod that unfurls the Dainty Sload\'s sails by using PROMETHEUS_ts\'s sail mesh. It is a mesh replacer of the Dainty Sload so no esp is needed and it is safe to uninstall if you ever want to.

This mod does not allow you to actually sail the boat around Skyrim. Again, it is just a mesh replacer.

And yes, I know it doesn\'t make sense for the sails to be unfurled for a ship that is at port. I just wanted some more variety in my game and figured maybe some other people would have a similar feeling.


==================
[color=#00ff7f]Incompatible:[/color]
==================

In my testing, it seems to be incompatible with Wyrmstooth.

Incompatible with mods that replace the mesh of the Dainty Sload. Retexture mods are completely compatible.


==================
[color=#00ff7f]Changelog:[/color]
==================

1/27/2013 - Initial Release


==================
[color=#00ff7f]Contact Details:[/color]
==================

If you run into any bugs or have any suggestions/comments, then either PM me here or leave them in the comments section.


==================
[color=#00ff7f]Credits:[/color]
==================

A big thanks to:
PROMETHEUS_ts for creating the sail mesh, the base texture of the sail, and just about everything else: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30494
And InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.
author: dj2005
